functions.name: Get recipients
functions.description: Returns all the recipients of a specific attestation

args.name: network
args.description: The network name or ID where the attestation is located. Currently supports: mainnet, arbitrum, sepolia, optimism-goerli, base-goerli

args.name: schema
args.description: The schema used for the attestation

args.name: key
args.description: The property of the schema that is being attested

args.name: value
args.description: The required value of the property that is being attested

functions.name: Get attestation values
functions.description: Returns all the recipients of a specific attestation and associate the values of it to the corresponding recipients addresses if these are numeric. Otherwise counts as 1.

args.name: network
args.description: The network name or ID where the attestation is located. Currently supports: mainnet, arbitrum, sepolia, optimism-goerli, base-goerli

args.name: schema
args.description: The schema used for the attestation

args.name: key
args.description: The property of the schema that is being attested

args.name: value
args.description: The required value of the property that is being attested
